adHeader: Honest Realtor make your San Fracisco home buying more easier-賀湘
adDetails: Buying a new home in San Francisco Bay Area is an exciting experience. It is also likely the largest investment you'll ever make. As your home buying agent, I will include an AHS ( American Home Shield) home warranty on your purchased home, It can give you the reassurance of knowing you're helping to safeguard that investment. Although you had an inspection, this home warranty ( not all home system components and appliances are covered ) can offer an extra level of comfort. Because you never know if something is going to break after inspection; and as it turns out. Please feel free contact me and have me as your home buying professional, I will provide you with a market analysis at no cost. I also can put this home protection plan on your purchased home, so you can enjoy the comfort of your new home without the hassles of repairs. A little about myself: *Have been living in San Francisco Bay Area for more than 25+ years, and I love San Francisco bay area and know it well. So I definitely can be your good neighborhood Realtor. *I have been running a local business in San Francisco since 1997 *Have managed a real estate business in Shanghai, China for 7 years. *Work with no.1 sales team in northern California, Elite Team of Century 21 Realty Alliance. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ***當您選擇我為您買屋，將可以獲得免費的房屋保修服務。買屋之後您將高枕無憂。*** 作為一位在舊金山灣區的房地產經紀人（BRE01950617），並擁有超過18年經驗的商業業主;我非常樂意為您，您的家人和親朋好友提供全方位的房地產服務。 關於我： *自1993年起，在舊金山灣區經營珠寶生意，不動產投資。了解您一生中最重要的各類地產投資需求。 *在上海的徐匯，靜安和打浦區域，從事過房產中介管理;熟悉中美的房產政策和程序，幫助您無縫銜接。 *合作無間的銷售團隊，為您服務不動產買賣。 歡迎隨時來電 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Jack / 賀湘元 Realtor, CA Lic: 01950617 Cell show contact info Century 21 Realty Alliance
